name: Top Down Shooter Extreme Hyper Mega:Deluxe Edition
name_original: Top Down Shooter Extreme Hyper Mega:Deluxe Edition
description:
Yea... it's a Top Down shooter..... but the deluxe edition! 

...oh and you can't save xD

Fun Fact: I wrote ":Deluxe Edition" at the end of the game name to make fun of these EA, Ubisoft, etc games which often have like deluxe, gold and advanced editions.
